page.title: 03GILBERDYKE SCHOOL
page.content:
They certainly catch them young at Gilberdyke Primary School - and they don't let the adults slip the net either! Parents are encouraged to help their children learn to read and the school has even prepared a booklet to explain how they can do so.
The school prepares children for their education after they leave their primary school by seeing that they have a good grasp of the basics - reading, writing and arithmetic. But it is not just the basics that are taught - the children are learning to use computers and word processors and learning about business from their own school bank.
